transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: So very good morning Pravesh Sharma baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji sir, ji.
Executive: Ji, ji, ji. Sir woh aapka call aaya tha do din pehle ki Hanumat Handloom ke owner aap hi hain. Ji, ji, ji. Ji, ji, ji. Aur kuch number ka issue tha. Mujhe thoda batayenge sir kya tha detail mein ek baar?
Customer: Sir mujhe, main yeh jo bataya gaya tha ladka jo aaya tha.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Jisne kara uska bhi naam Amit hi hai. Usne mujhse kaha tha ki isme jo hai query vagera aaya karengi. Ab dedh se do mahine ho gaye hain. Mere paas na toh koi query aayi. Main use check karna chah raha hu na woh check ho pa raha hai. Use phone kar raha hu woh phone nahi utha raha. Aur yeh kabhi keh rehta hai yun ki ji main Jaipur hu, kabhi batata main Bareilly hu.
Executive: [inaudible]
Customer: Toh us jawab nahi aa raha mujhe kuch bhi iska. Yeh Ishita Grover phone hai sir. Ishita Grover jinka yeh number hai. Main nahi jaanta ji kaun hai yeh.
Executive: Aap inko jaante hi nahi hain?
Customer: Main jaanta hi nahi inhe kaun hai.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Ji. Aur yeh jab se start hua hai September se. Aapne ek baar bhi login nahi kara IndiaMART se? Nahi maine, maine kabhi login nahi kara ji. Mere paas usse baat chit hui thi bas OTP vagera usne mujhse liya tha. Woh maine usse de diya. Do teen OTP aaye the ispe. Aapne kyun, aapne apna number, number change hone kyun diya matlab aapne unse? Mujhe nahi, mujhe toh sir jaankari nahi thi is baare mein. Mujhe toh kuch pata hi nahi.
Executive: [inaudible]
Customer: Mujhse toh bas yeh kaha gaya ki ji query aaya karengi. Aur yeh number main aapka daal diya. Mera GST number le liya. Aur bas yeh bataya ki sab password OTP aayega woh bata dena mujhe.
Customer: Maine OTP bata diya. Lekin ab woh ab tak toh thoda Diwali ka season chal raha tha toh us wajah se main dhyan nahi de paya ab tak. Ji, ji, ji. Ji, ji tha. Ab Diwali ke baad mein maine socha ki maine kaha ab kaam dheela ho gaya toh maine kaha dekho uska kya fayda hota hai kya nahi hota.
Executive: Samajh gaya main. Ah, toh mujhe ek cheez batana tha yeh jo email ID dali hai yeh bhi aapki nahi hai. Ek second rukiye main email ID aapko batata hu. Ek second rukiye ga.





Email ID hai sir ah.

Ek second rukiye ga.


Haa. Email ID IshitaGroverOfficial@gmail.com. Yeh email ID bhi aapki nahi hai? Nahi ji, main, main Grover ko jaanta hi nahi bhaiya kisi Grover ko. Meri toh mail ID Amit Sharma ke naam se hi hai. Usi naam se hi meri yeh firm registered hai. Main hi proprietor hu iska. GST aapke naam pe hi hai. Ji, iski GST aapke naam pe hi hai. GST mere naam par hi hai aur yeh mere naam par do bill kate hue hain yeh. Usi din ke. Yeh toh mere paas hi hai na. Mujhe bataya ki yeh yeh yeh kaise aaya yeh toh maine usse kaha maine kaha toh ek ki baat hui thi meri usse yeh do bill kaise kate hue hain mere naam par yeh. Yeh August ke mahine mein hai yeh. Main bill dekh leta hu. Do bill toh nahi honge. Ek second rukiye. Yeh do bill hai main aapko abhi bata sakta hu mere paas. 37,000 ah. Toh yeh do baar kyun, do, do. Sir yeh do baar kyun show ho raha hai? Aap agar WhatsApp pe ho toh main aapko abhi iska woh bhej dunga abhi. Ek minute hold karo dekho ji Atul. Main WhatsApp mein hi likh ke bhej raha hu aapko ek. Aap bhejo main aapko dekho iski kyunki meri 2B bhari jaati hai na har mahine. Return jo bhari jaati hai. Toh yeh August ke mahine mein aur yeh aa gaya haa. August ke mahine mein do baar hi hai yeh. 27/8 mein 37,760 phir 37,760. Do bill hai yeh.
Mujhe ek baar dekhne dijiye jinhone bheja hai woh system mein hai abhi. Ek second rukiye ga. Ji. Aur unka kaam kis cheez ka hai? Mera toh sofe cover ka kaam hai, handloom ka kaam hai mera. Aur mere GST se unhone aise kyun kara yeh?
Designer lehenga choli yeh sab dala hua hai isme toh. Yeh toh sir mera toh iska kaam hi nahi hai. Mera kaam hai sofe cover ka, bedsheet ka. Ispe na sab saadi choodi aur yeh sab dala hua hai sir. Mera isse saadi, saadi, saadi suit ka mera koi kaam nahi hai. Ab mujhe yeh batao. Payment hua hai. Ek second rukiye ga main ek baar dekh lu sell kisne kara tha aur woh bhi system mein hai. Theek hai na sir ji.

Aapko sir day one pe hi bolna chahiye tha. Ek second rukiye ga. Sir mujhe jaankari nahi thi. Mujhe toh ab yeh cheez hai na uske baad mein bataya ki ji aapne IndiaMART se kya kya liya tha yeh. Do bill kate hue hain IndiaMART se 37,760 ke. Aapka number ah. Aapka number repeat kijiyega sir ek baar. 87 91 haa 38 haa 2982
Sir main yeh aap main yeh na sir inke jo manager hai saare. Himanshu naam aa raha hai yaha pe Himanshu jo aap se baat kar raha tha us time. Nahi matlab jo mere se baat kar raha tha mere se kaun jisne jisko maine complaint karai thi woh? Nahi jis jisne aap se baat kari hai na. Haa wohi toh bata raha hu sir jisne jis jisko maine complaint kari thi woh unka naam Himanshu hai. Jinhone complaint number diya tha. Jisne aap se payment li thi jis se aapki baat hui hai payment wale din jo main yaha pe dekh raha hu. Nahi woh toh Amit hai. Amit hai. Woh Amit hai. Ab aap, ab aap mujhe ek baat batao woh toh phone utha nahi raha aaj main uske ghar ja raha hu. Yeh mujhe isme se maan lo yeh cancel karana ho toh uske liye kya karna padega yeh? Ya apne maan lo chalo agar. Hai ji? Haa, haa. Number toh main change karwa dunga sir. Number toh main change karwa dunga isme. Aap mujhe ek baar daage daalne dijiye. Acha. Aisa kuch bhi nahi hai. Aap owner hai bas aap ek kaam kijiyega maine WhatsApp mein aapko hi likh ke bheja hai. Theek hai sir? Ji. Ji. Toh haa toh main aapko isme na sir woh daal raha hu. Matlab aap mujhe isme ek toh apni yeh Pravesh Sharma naam hai aapka? Haan ji, haan ji. Aap teen page ka. Dekho aap. Dekho main, main aapko yeh bhej raha hu ab yeh dekho. Apni yeh 2B ki return mujhe bhari gayi hai isme dekho yeh niche hai 12 aur 13 number jo hai yeh. Sir isme na jo ah jiske aage zero laga hua hai. Ji. Ek second rukiye ga main aapko bata deta hu. Jiske aage zero laga hua hai na usko exclude kar dijiye. Woh galti se IndiaMART se double ban gaye the us time pe. Yeh humne cancel kara diye hain. Aapko one wale ka hi bharna hai jo 181 hai na sir invoice. Achcha, achcha, achcha. Woh dekh rahe ho kyunki number dono ka same hi hai. Ek mein zero aur ek mein zero nahi hai. Woh actually hua kya tha ki by mistake na entry galat ho gayi thi sirf aapki nahi IndiaMART level pe us mahine mein jitne invoice bane the sab mein. Aap zero wale ko exclude kar dena woh aapko nahi dikhega waha pe uspe file bhi nahi woh hum cancel karwa bhi chuke hain already. Woh ab abhi tak aapko dikhega bhi nahi hai woh waha pe. Yeh kab bheja tha unhone aapko? Achcha. Yeh toh ji mujhe August ki August ki hai yeh unhone mujhe September mein bheja tha. August ki hai na abhi, abhi, abhi yeh dikhega nahi unko. Ab yeh nahi dikhega. Achcha, achcha. Hum, humne waha se cancel karwa diya hai. Main aapka number change karwata hu aur main ek baar pura aage highlight karta hu kisne yeh kara aur kis wajah se hua. Aap mujhe bas ek kaam kijiyega ah aap apna GST teen page ka apna Aadhar card aur company letter head rehta hai sir aapke paas company letter head? Ji. Nahi letter head ki toh kabhi mujhe jarurat hi nahi padegi. Letter head nahi hai aapke paas? Toh aap apna mobile number aur email ID bhi mujhe WhatsApp pe likh ke dijiye jo aap isme update karwana chahte hain. Na, na, na. Theek hai sir? Theek hai ji. Main karwata hu fikar mat kariye aapke naam pe hi aayega yeh main change karwa dunga. Theek hai. Aur yeh kaise hua kis wajah se hua main yeh pura track karwata hu. Theek hai sir? Achcha main puch raha hu sir yeh jaise isne kara ab tak toh iski mujhe, mujhe toh koi pareshani nahi aayegi ab jo jo kaam kar chuke hai yeh ispe. Maan lo mere Aadhar card mere GST number pe. Koi pareshani nahi aayegi sir. Koi pareshani nahi aayegi aap din mein befikar rahiye. Usme main aapke aage inka yeh hatwa dunga sab kuch. Aapke aage inka saara login and everything band karwaunga. Theek hai sir? Theek hai. Theek hai sir. Okay. Main aapko apne number
summary:
\n
Concerns:\n
- Customer has not received any buyleads.
- Unable to check profile.
- Executive changed the number without customer's consent.
- Two bills generated instead of one.
- Irrelevant products listed on profile.\n
\n
Resolution:\n
- Executive assured to change the number.
- Executive assured to remove irrelevant products.
- Executive asked to share GST, Aadhar card, email ID.\n
\n
Next Steps: \n
- Customer will share documents on WhatsApp.\n
\n
Alert (If Any):\n
refund\n
@@@Sentiment:\n
- Angry -> Satisfied\n
\n
@@@Key Topics:\n
- refund, subscription, verification, buyleads, profile\n
\n
